tsa 3p irr neutralizers plate.enriched_query: We are seeking suppliers of a Tryptic Soy Agar (TSA) 3-Phase Irradiated (IRR) Neutralizers Plate. This is a ready-to-use microbial culture medium plate used for environmental monitoring and surface sampling, formulated with neutralizers to inactivate residual disinfectants. TSA plates with neutralizers are typically employed in pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical cleanroom, production, and quality control settings to validate cleaning processes. Please provide detailed product specifications, including format (triple-bagged or triple-wrapped), type of neutralizers included, irradiation status and method for sterility assurance, packaging options, quality certifications, and documentation supporting regulatory compliance. Include information on price, storage conditions, shelf life, regulatory certifications, pack size, catalog number, manufacturer, and shipping/lead times. Product must meet cGMP/ISO requirements as applicable for environmental monitoring in regulated biopharma environments.

comparison_attributes.description: Unit price of the product, including currency and quantity per order.
Recommended storage temperature and handling requirements for the product.
Length of time the product remains stable and usable under recommended storage conditions.
Regulatory and quality certifications relevant for pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical applications.
Number of plates or units per package or kit.
Vendor product code, reference number, or SKU used for ordering.
Brand or company that produces, supplies, or distributes the product.
Expected delivery time, availability, and shipping details.
Whether the plates are gamma-irradiated for sterility, including compliance with sterility standards.
Details on types and concentrations of chemical neutralizers present to inactivate a range of disinfectants.
Physical configuration such as triple-bagged, triple-wrapped, contact or settle plate type suitable for cleanroom transfer.
Supporting documents such as Certificates of Analysis, Certificates of Irradiation, Lot Release, and Validation documentation.

discovery.raw_response:
**Vendor: SGL (Southern Group Laboratory)** – *Product:* “TSA Surfacecheck® N (Tryptone Soya Agar + Neutralisers), Contact Plate, Irradiated”.  This is a 55 mm contact plate of pre-poured TSA medium with built-in neutralizers, supplied gamma-irradiated and triple-wrapped (VHP double pouch + outer bag).  It is designed for environmental surface sampling and comes in packs of 10.  Shelf life is ~26 weeks (at 2–25 °C).  **Confidence:** High – exact TSA+neutralizer plate match (triple‐wrapped, irradiated) ([www.sglab.com](https://www.sglab.com/product/tsa-surfacecheck-tryptone-soya-agar-neutralisers-contact-plate-irradiated/#:~:text=Container%20%20,0.2)) ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/AE/en/product/mm/146697#:~:text=Neutralizer%20A%20ICR%2B%20is%20designed,In%20addition%2C%20the%20ICRplus)).  **Recommendation:** 0.90 – reputable specialized supplier.  **Concerns:** None obvious; product is in stock per site.  

**Vendor: Merck Millipore (Sigma-Aldrich)** – *Product:* “Tryptic Soy Agar – Ready-to-use Contact Plates – Neutralizer A (ICR plus) with lockable lid, 55 mm, γ-irradiated, triple packed (pkg of 10)”.  This is a pre-poured 55 mm TSA contact plate containing Neutralizer A (a mix of lecithin, Tween, histidine, thiosulfate, etc.) to inactivate disinfectants.  Plates are gamma-irradiated for sterility and triple-wrapped.  Pack size is 10 plates; high quality (USP/EP compendial).  **Confidence:** High – exact match (TSA+neutralizer, 55 mm, irradiated, triple-packed) ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/AE/en/product/mm/146697#:~:text=Neutralizer%20A%2C%20ICR%20plus%20with,packed%2C%20suitable%20for%20surface%20monitoring)) ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/AE/en/product/mm/146697#:~:text=Neutralizer%20A%20ICR%2B%20is%20designed,In%20addition%2C%20the%20ICRplus)).  **Recommendation:** 0.95 – leading manufacturer with cGMP-grade media.  **Concerns:** None; item listed (catalog 1.46697) is actively offered.  

**Vendor: Thermo Fisher (Thermo Scientific / Oxoid)** – *Product:* “Triple Wrap Sterile Pack Tryptone Soya Agar with Neutralizers, VHP indicator, and 2D Barcode (55 mm plates)”.  This is a 55 mm TSA contact plate with built-in neutralizers (polysorbate 80, lecithin, etc.), supplied sterile in a triple-wrapped container including a VHP (peroxide) indicator film and barcode.  It is gamma-irradiated and comes 100 plates/pack.  **Confidence:** High – exact match on format (TSA + neutralizers, 55 mm, triple-irradiated) ([www.fishersci.com](https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/triple-wrap-sterile-pack-w-vhp-indicator-tryptone-soya-agar-9/p-9571001#:~:text=Description%20%20,irradiated%2C%20with%20VHP%20barrier%20wrap)).  **Recommendation:** 0.90 – top-tier supplier (Fisher Scientific/Thermo Scientific) with specialized EM plates.  **Concerns:** Large pack size (100 plates); includes VHP indicator which may be optional.  

**Vendor: CPC Biotech** – *Product:* “MCTA (TSA+Lec+Tw80) + L-Hystidine + S. Thiosulphate, 55 mm TWSI”.  This is a ready-made 55 mm plate of Tryptic Soy Agar supplemented with lecithin, Tween 80, L-Histidine, and sodium thiosulfate (four neutralizers for quats, phenolics, aldehydes, halogens).  The plates are irradiated, sterile, and triple-wrapped; sold in bulk (pack of 240 plates; order code 449INHY/21.240).  **Confidence:** High – exact TSA + multi-neutralizer plate (triple packaging, irradiated) ([www.cpcbiotech.it](https://www.cpcbiotech.it/en/microbial-content-test-agar-tsalectw80-l-hystidine-s-thiosulphate-2/#:~:text=MCTA%20%28TSA%2BLec%2BTw80%29%20%2B%20L,Thiosulphate%2055mm%20TWSI)) ([www.cpcbiotech.it](https://www.cpcbiotech.it/en/media-portfolio/irradiated-plates/#:~:text=MCTA%20%28TSA%2BLec%2BTw80%29%20%2B%20L,240%20240)).  **Recommendation:** 0.85 – exact spec match from a specialized manufacturer.  **Concerns:** Smaller European supplier – check availability/shipment to India.  

**Vendor: EWC Diagnostics** – *Product:* “Tryptic Soy Agar + Neutralizing (Contact Plate)”.  This is a 55 mm TSA contact plate containing a neutralizer blend (histidine, lecithin, polysorbate 80 (Tween 80), sodium thiosulfate) to inactivate disinfectant residues.  Plates are gamma-irradiated and triple-bagged; sold 20 plates/pack (Ref. 15339S).  **Confidence:** High – exact match (TSA + disinfectant neutralizers, triple-irradiated plates) ([www.ewcdiagnostics.com](https://www.ewcdiagnostics.com/tryptic-soy-agar-neutralizing/#:~:text=The%20composition%20of%20TSA%20complies,treatment%20of%20surfaces%20and%20materials)).  **Recommendation:** 0.80 – fulfills requirements, though vendor is smaller.  **Concerns:** Limited shelf life (9 months per datasheet) and smaller pack size; confirm availability.

e.coli hcdna kits; cat #: 4458435.enriched_query: Seeking vendor information and quotations for Escherichia coli Host Cell DNA (HcDNA) quantification kits, specifically Catalog Number 4458435. These kits are used for detecting and quantifying residual host cell DNA in biopharmaceutical samples, essential for product safety and regulatory compliance. Please provide detailed specifications including unit price, storage conditions, shelf life, relevant quality or regulatory certifications, pack size, manufacturer details, catalog number, and delivery lead time. Additionally, include technical details relating to sensitivity, detection method, compatibility with instrumentation (e.g., qPCR), assay time, and sample throughput.

comparison_attributes.description: Unit price, currency, and quantity per purchase unit
Temperature and storage requirements for the product
Duration the kit remains stable and usable under recommended storage conditions
Regulatory and quality compliance such as GMP, ISO, USP, IVD, RUO, etc.
Quantity or number of reactions provided per kit
Unique product identifier such as catalog or SKU number
Name of the company producing or supplying the kit
Delivery timeline and product availability status
Analytical technique used for DNA quantitation, e.g. qPCR, hybridization assay
Lowest quantity of E. coli DNA that can be reliably detected
Total duration required to complete the analysis
Compatible laboratory instruments and platforms (e.g., qPCR thermocyclers, specific brands/models)

discovery.raw_response:
- **Thermo Fisher Scientific (Applied Biosystems)** – [resDNASEQ™ Quantitative E. coli DNA Kit (Assay Kit only, Cat# 4458435)](https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/hk/zt/4458435): A qPCR-based TaqMan assay kit for highly sensitive quantitation of E. coli host cell DNA in biopharmaceutical samples.  Includes master mix, primers/probes, genomic DNA standard and controls (100-reaction kit).  Provides a complete sample-to-signal solution (LOQ ~15 pg DNA/mL) for residual DNA testing in ≤4 h.  *Confidence:* High (exact product by manufacturer); *Recommendation:* 1.0 – “Exact product match from a tier-1 supplier.”; *Concerns:* None (widely available, IVD-use not stated but optimized for research QC).
- **Revvity (Avantor/VWR)** – [HostDetect E.coli PCR DNA Quant Kit (DXMDX-RGT-1005)](https://www.revvity.com/product/hostdetect-e-coli-pcr-dna-quant-kit-dxmdx-rgt-1005): A real-time qPCR assay (RUO) for quantitative detection of residual E. coli genomic DNA in bioprocess samples.  Uses a TaqMan® probe and primer mix with Environmental Master Mix (2×) to detect E. coli host DNA at fg–pg levels (sensitivity ~0.03 pg/rxn).  Compatible with standard qPCR instruments (ABI 7500, CFX96, etc.).  *Confidence:* High (well-defined equivalent kit); *Recommendation:* 0.8 – “Sensitive qPCR-based HCD kit from a global supplier.”; *Concerns:* Research-use status (not IVD); requires quote (no direct online purchase indicated).
- **Bio-Rad Laboratories** – [VeriCheck ddPCR E.coli Residual DNA Quantification Kit (#17000032)](https://www.bio-rad.com/en-es/sku/17000032-vericheck-ddpcr-e-coli-residual-dna-quantification-kit): A droplet digital PCR kit for ultrahigh-sensitivity quantification of E. coli residual DNA.  Designed for Bio-Rad QX100/200 ddPCR systems, it contains 200 reactions of assay mix and ddPCR supermix to detect femtogram amounts of E. coli host DNA.  LOD ~15 fg, LOQ ≤30 fg per 20 µL.  *Confidence:* High (established ddPCR solution); *Recommendation:* 0.9 – “Highly sensitive, reputable ddPCR kit for E. coli HCD quantitation.”; *Concerns:* Requires specialized ddPCR instrument; RUO product.
- **Yeasen Biotechnology** – [E. coli Host Cell DNA Residue Detection Kit (2G, Cat# 41308ES60)](https://www.yeasenbio.com/id/products/41308): A research-use qPCR kit (TaqMan probe-based) for quantitative detection of residual E. coli host DNA in intermediate or final bioproduct samples.  Kit includes Amplicon-specific master mix, primer/probe mix, DNA control (30 ng/µL) and diluents (for 100 reactions).  Claimed detection limit at femtogram level.  *Confidence:* Medium (close functional match); *Recommendation:* 0.7 – “Validated E. coli HCD kit from an alternative supplier.”; *Concerns:* RUO only; additional sample-prep kit required; overseas vendor (may affect lead time).
- **KACTUS Bio** – [E. coli Residual DNA (qPCR) Detection Kit (Cat# DK-E003)](https://kactusbio.com/products/e-coli-residual-dna-qpcr-detection-kit-dk-e003): A 100-reaction TaqMan qPCR kit for quantifying residual E. coli host DNA in biopharmaceutical products.  Includes qPCR reagents and probes targeting common E. coli strains (e.g. DH5α, BL21).  Linear range 30 fg–300 pg/µL per reaction.  *Confidence:* Medium (meets intended purpose); *Recommendation:* 0.6 – “Suitable research-use kit with claimed fg sensitivity.”; *Concerns:* RUO; less-known supplier.
- **Eagle Biosciences** – [E. coli Residual DNA Detection Kit (qPCR, SKU HG-ED001)](https://eaglebio.com/product/e-coli-residual-dna-detection-kit-qpcr/): A 100-reaction real-time PCR (TaqMan) kit for detecting residual E. coli DNA in bioproduct samples.  For research use.  Lists sensitivity ~30 fg/µL and dynamic range 30–3×10^5 fg/µL.  Compatible with ABI 7500, Bio-Rad CFX96 etc.  *Confidence:* Medium; *Recommendation:* 0.7 – “Relevant profile and sensitivity for HCD detection.”; *Concerns:* High unit cost ($), RUO kit.

proteina mix-n-go elisakit f600.enriched_query: We are seeking detailed vendor information and quotations for the 'Proteina Mix-N-Go ELISA Kit (Catalog Number: F600)'. This kit is presumed to be an enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) product intended for the quantitative or qualitative detection of target analytes in biological samples. Please provide comprehensive product details relevant to procurement, including unit price, storage requirements, shelf life, quality and regulatory certifications (such as RUO, IVD, ISO, GMP), pack size (number of tests or wells per kit), catalog number/SKU, manufacturer information, and expected lead time for delivery. For optimal vendor comparison, also include key specifications such as assay format (e.g., sandwich, direct, indirect), sensitivity (lowest detectable concentration), sample type compatibility (e.g., serum, plasma, cell lysate), and detection method (e.g., colorimetric, chemiluminescent). Indicate intended use (e.g., research use only/RUO or diagnostic/IVD) and provide datasheets or documentation if available.

The product should be non-reactive, sterile, and compatible with laboratory shaking incubators. Please provide information regarding physical and chemical resistance, cap type and closure options, sterility assurance methods, and suitability for single-use workflows. Ensure details include price per unit and pack, storage and shelf life, all regulatory or quality certifications, pack size, catalog or stock number, manufacturer/brand, and quoted lead time. Additional details on volume accuracy, flask geometry (baffle or plain), and cap closure type (vented or non-vented) are requested for in-depth specification comparison.

- **Sigma-Aldrich (Merck)** – *Nalgene® sterile, single-use Erlenmeyer flask with vented closure (PETG, 125 mL, case of 24 ea)* – [Product Page](https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/KR/en/product/sigma/tmo41150125).  These flasks are made of medical-grade PETG (XD resin) and come gamma-sterilized with a 0.2 µm vented HDPE screw cap for sterile gas exchange.  They are graduated, non-cytotoxic, USP Class VI compliant and suitable for shaking incubators.  **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.9 – Exact match from a tier-1 supplier (Merck Sigma/Nalgene) with confirmed specs.  **Reason:** Meets all requirements (vented PETG, 125 mL, sterile, shaker-compatible).  **Concerns:** Currently “Contact Customer Service for Availability” on the site (likely backordered), and regional site required inquiry.      

- **Thermo Fisher Scientific (Nalgene)** – *Nalgene™ Single-Use PETG Erlenmeyer Flask with Plain Bottom (125 mL, sterile)* – [Product Page](https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/4115-0125).  This is the standard Nalgene PETG flask (plain flat bottom) sold as a pack of sterile flasks, vented (38×430 mm caps) or non-vented variants. It’s made from USP-grade PETG, gamma-irradiated, and available with hydrophobic vent caps or solid caps. **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.9 – Exact product match from the primary manufacturer.  **Reason:** Nalgene is highly reputable; catalog lists 125 mL vented (4115-0125) and non-vented (4112-0125) options with identical specs.  **Concerns:** Listing shows “Available Soon – part #: 4115-0125” and “Contact for Availability,” indicating possible backorder.  

- **Tarsons (India)** – *Sterile Erlenmeyer Cell Culture Flask, Baffled base, PETG with Vented HDPE closure (125 mL)* – [Product Page](https://www.tarsons.com/product/sterile-erlenmeyer-cell-culture-flask-baffled-base-petg-with-vented-hdpe-closure/).  Made in India from medical-grade PETG (USP Class VI), these flasks have molded graduations, gamma sterilization, and a hydrophobic 0.2 µm PTFE vent cap (HDPE body). The baffled bottom design improves mixing and gas exchange. Each flask is individually wrapped; pack size is 24 per case.  **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.9 – An exact-match product from a known biotech plasticware manufacturer.  **Reason:** Specification (125 mL, PETG, sterile, vented, baffled) aligns fully; additional features (non-cytotoxic, autoclave rating “No”, -40–70°C range) suit bioprocess use.  **Concerns:** None significant; Tarsons is local to India, but international shipments may still be needed.  

- **CellTreat (via Quality Biological)** – *CellTreat 125 mL Erlenmeyer Flask, Solid Cap, Plain Bottom, PETG, Sterile* – [Product Page](https://www.qualitybiological.com/product/125ml-erlenmeyer-flask-solid-cap-plain-bottom-petg-sterile/).  These single-use flasks are molded from medical-grade virgin PETG (reducing gas permeability), gamma-sterilized in individual bags. The plain-bottom flasks come with green HDPE solid screw caps (no vent). They are USP Class VI compliant and suitable for cell or microbial culture.  **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.8 – Exact 125 mL PETG sterile flask with a solid (non-vented) cap.  **Reason:** Matches query except closure type; reputable lab supplier.  **Concerns:** Only solid-cap version (no vent), and packaged 1 per bag (12 per case), which may differ from some vented-closure requests.  

- **NEST Biotech (Genaxy)** – *NEST PETG Erlenmeyer Flask* – [Product Page](https://www.genaxy.com/products/details/213).  NEST offers 125 mL PETG shaker flasks in both baffled and plain bottoms. The caps come in seal (solid) or ventilated versions with 0.2 µm hydrophobic filters. They are E-beam sterilized (SAL 10^-6), non-pyrogenic, DNase/RNase free, individually shrink-wrapped, and graded.   **Confidence:** Medium. **Score:** 0.7 – Close equivalent produced by a recognized manufacturer (NEST Scientific).  **Reason:** The specs (125 mL, PETG, sterile, with vent/screw-cap options) match well.  **Concerns:** Lower brand recognition outside China, may require import and lead time; site indicates “Request a Quote.”  

- **Eisco Labs** – *Eisco 125 mL Sterile PETG Erlenmeyer Flask, Vented, Flat Bottom (Pack of 1)* – [Product Page](https://www.eiscolabs.com/products/ch5238).  This lab-grade flask is gamma-irradiated (USP Class VI) PETG with a vented HDPE screw cap for sterile gas exchange. It is labeled for biopharma/cell culture use.  **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.9 – Direct match to requirement (125 mL PETG sterile, vented, flat-bottom).  **Reason:** Well-specified product from a known supplier.  **Concerns:** Sold as pack of 1 (single flask); unit price high if bulk purchases needed.  

Each listed vendor provides an exact or near-exact 125 mL PETG Erlenmeyer flask suitable for cell/microbial culture.  All entries are sterile, non-cytotoxic, and shake-incubator compatible.  Ratings are based on match quality and vendor reliability; concerns note availability or packaging issues (e.g. some items are backordered or sold individually).

8'epdm gloves 32''long 9.75''hand size.enriched_query: Request for vendor information and quotations on 8 mil thick EPDM (Ethylene Propylene Diene Monomer) chemical-resistant gloves. The gloves should be 32 inches long with a hand size of approximately 9.75 inches. Intended for use in pharmaceutical or bioprocessing applications requiring extended forearm protection and robust chemical resistance. Please provide details on glove thickness, material purity, physical durability (tensile strength), puncture and tear resistance, and product documentation/certifications suitable for regulated environments. Include information regarding packaging, storage conditions, shelf life, available certifications (such as ISO or FDA), catalog numbers, manufacturer, price, standard pack size, typical lead times, and relevant safety data or testing results.

comparison_attributes.description: Unit price of the gloves, including the currency and quantity per unit.
Recommended temperature and environmental conditions for storing the gloves.
The period during which the gloves maintain specified physical properties and sterility.
Regulatory, safety, and quality certifications demonstrating compliance with industry standards.
Number of gloves or pairs per package.
Product catalog or SKU number to identify and order the gloves.
Name of the manufacturer or brand of the gloves.
Estimated time from order placement to delivery or availability.
The thickness of the glove material, typically in mils or millimeters.
Total length of the glove, offering extended protection (e.g., 32 inches).
Hand size that the glove is designed to fit, ensuring proper fit and dexterity.
Suitability and validated resistance of EPDM gloves against bioprocessing chemicals.
Whether gloves are supplied sterile or non-sterile and relevant sterility assurance information.

discovery.raw_response:
- **Ansell – *AlphaTec® EPDM Isolator Gloves 85-502*** – Non-sterile dual-colored black/white EPDM isolator gloves with extended (32″/800 mm) length. Material is EPDM (ethylene-propylene-diene) with 0.4 mm (16 mil) thickness, designed for repeated autoclave sterilization and strong resistance to hydrogen peroxide and other disinfectants ([www.ansell.com](https://www.ansell.com/int/en/products/alphatec-epdm-isolator-glove-85-502#:~:text=Port%20size%3A%20254mm%2F10%E2%80%9D%20Thickness%3A%200,suitable%20for%20disposal%20by%20incineration)) ([www.ansell.com](https://www.ansell.com/int/en/products/alphatec-epdm-isolator-glove-85-502#:~:text=,SHAPE%20Ambidextrous)). Ambidextrous, FDA 21 CFR 177 compliant and rated for chemical protection. (Vendor: Ansell, product URL: https://www.ansell.com/int/en/products/alphatec-epdm-isolator-glove-85-502)  
  *Confidence: Medium* (Close match in length and use, thickness is 16 mil instead of 8 mil). *Recommendation: 0.75* – Ansell is a tier-1 PPE vendor; product is the correct EPDM material and length. *Reason:* Nearly all specifications match except the glove is thicker than requested. *Concerns:* Thicker glove may reduce dexterity. Availability is generally good for Ansell, but this specific model is non-sterile (for RABS/isolator use) and thicker than 8 mil.  

- **Demaco Holland (Glovebox Supplies) – *EPDM glove, 8″ port, 15 mil, 32″ length*** – EPDM glove for glovebox port (Item 8E1532A0975). It is 32″ (800 mm) long, ambidextrous, hand size ≈9.75″, and 0.4 mm (15 mil) thick ([demaco-vacuum.com](https://demaco-vacuum.com/product-category/glovebox-solvent-purification/spare-glovebox-gloves/epdm-glove/#:~:text=32%E2%80%B3%20long%20%28800mm%29%2CHand%20size%209,4)). Sold per glove (not a pair) as “Spare Glovebox Gloves” ([demaco-vacuum.com](https://demaco-vacuum.com/product-category/glovebox-solvent-purification/spare-glovebox-gloves/epdm-glove/#:~:text=32%E2%80%B3%20long%20%28800mm%29%2CHand%20size%209,4)). (Vendor: Demaco; URL: https://demaco-vacuum.com/product-category/glovebox-solvent-purification/spare-glovebox-gloves/epdm-glove/)  
  *Confidence: Medium* (Exact product specification except thickness). *Recommendation: 0.72* – Demaco is a reputable specialty glovebox supplier and this listing matches the material, port size, length, and user size exactly ([demaco-vacuum.com](https://demaco-vacuum.com/product-category/glovebox-solvent-purification/spare-glovebox-gloves/epdm-glove/#:~:text=32%E2%80%B3%20long%20%28800mm%29%2CHand%20size%209,4)). *Reason:* EPDM, 32″ length, ambidextrous and FDA-compliant as required for pharma use. *Concerns:* Offered thickness is 15 mil vs requested 8 mil (double the thickness). Slight concern that Demaco sells per glove, and availability may require a minimum order or take 1 week delivery ([demaco-vacuum.com](https://demaco-vacuum.com/product-category/glovebox-solvent-purification/spare-glovebox-gloves/epdm-glove/#:~:text=32%E2%80%B3%20long%20%28800mm%29%2CHand%20size%209,4mm%29%20thick)).  

- **Albiox (Piercan) – *Isolator Glove EPDM black/white*** – Dual-layer EPDM (black outside, white lining) long isolator glove, halogen-free, powder-donned. Chemical-resistant (good vs H₂O₂, peracetic acid, etc.), UV/ozone resistant, FDA/CFR21-compliant ([albiox.com](https://albiox.com/product/epdm-black-epdm-white-isolator-glove/#:~:text=Black%20EPDM%20and%20White%20EPDM,on%20a%20secure%20connection%20ring)). Offered in two thickness grades: ~0.4 mm (16 mil) and ~0.6 mm (24 mil) ([albiox.com](https://albiox.com/product/epdm-black-epdm-white-isolator-glove/#:~:text=Thicknesses%3A)). It is typically 32″ in length (±20 mm tolerance) ([albiox.com](https://albiox.com/product/epdm-black-epdm-white-isolator-glove/#:~:text=,5%2F10)). Sold in packs of 10, lightly powdered ([albiox.com](https://albiox.com/product/epdm-black-epdm-white-isolator-glove/#:~:text=Packaging%20Individually%20packed%20in%20two,Pack%20of%2010%20units)). (Vendor: Albiox (distributor in Finland, global reach); Product URL: https://albiox.com/product/epdm-black-epdm-white-isolator-glove/)  
  *Confidence: Medium* (Material and use match, but nominal thickness 16–24 mil). *Recommendation: 0.70* – Piercan (through Albiox) is a major glovebox glove maker (ISO certified). The two thickness options cover the needed EPDM type. *Reason:* Exact EPDM glove for isolator use; vendor is specialized and high-quality. *Concerns:* Thinner available version is still 16 mil (vs requested 8 mil). Pack and lot requirements (min 10) and sterilization status (sold sterile, etc.) must be clarified. Possibly longer lead time due to specialty product.  

- **GloveBoxGloves (UK) – *EPDM Gauntlets & Sleeves*** – EPDM long sleeves (gloves) designed for glovebox and lab use. Made of EPDM with 0.4 mm (15 mil) thickness and provided 800 mm (31.5″) overall length ([gloveboxgloves.co.uk](https://gloveboxgloves.co.uk/product/edpm-gaunlets-and-sleeves/#:~:text=Colour%3A%20Black%20Port%20Sizes%20Diameter%3A%C2%A0203mm,4F%20to%20266F)). Available with cuff and O-ring fittings; smooth texture, antistatic, UV-resistant ([gloveboxgloves.co.uk](https://gloveboxgloves.co.uk/product/edpm-gaunlets-and-sleeves/#:~:text=%2A%20Manufactured%20from%20EPDM%2C%20Ethylene,UV%20Resistant)). The product listing (SKU G-EDP) describes 32″ gloves with hand size 9 and 8″/10″ port compatibility ([gloveboxgloves.co.uk](https://gloveboxgloves.co.uk/product/edpm-gaunlets-and-sleeves/#:~:text=Specification)). (Vendor: GloveBoxGloves, UK; URL: https://gloveboxgloves.co.uk/product/edpm-gaunlets-and-sleeves/)  
  *Confidence: Medium* (Excellent match on length and material, slightly thicker). *Recommendation: 0.72* – Specialist glovebox supplier and global shipping available. *Reason:* Direct EPDM glove product with correct dimensions (close) and explicitly intended for lab/pharma glovebox use. *Concerns:* Thickness is 15 mil instead of 8 mil, and only hand size 9 listed. No explicit sterility certification mentioned. Stock status should be confirmed.  

- **Glove Box Australia – *EPDM GLOVE – 8.5 – 4/10 – 800 – Ø156*** – Ambidextrous EPDM black glove (Piercan brand), hand size 8.5 (9″), 0.4 mm (15 mil) thick, 800 mm long ([www.labhub.au](https://www.labhub.au/products/epdm-glove-8-5-4-10-800mm-o156?Title=Default+Title#:~:text=Suitable%20for%20every%20glove%20box,manufacturers)). Designed for 156 mm (6.14″) glove port (part “4/10” indicates the port), FDA-food-contact compliant with high chemical resistance ([www.labhub.au](https://www.labhub.au/products/epdm-glove-8-5-4-10-800mm-o156?Title=Default+Title#:~:text=Black%20EPDM%20,2600)). Sold by the glove; MOQ 20 gloves. (Vendor: Glove Box Australia; URL: https://www.gloveboxaustralia.com.au/products/epdm-glove-8-5-4-10-800mm-o156)  
  *Confidence: Medium* (Correct length and EPDM; thickness mismatch). *Recommendation: 0.70* – Reputable supplier in Asia-Pacific (sources Piercan gloves). Exact match of EPDM long glove (31.5″, size 8.5). *Reason:* Close spec and clear vendor specialization. *Concerns:* Only one thickness offered (0.4 mm). MOQ of 20 indicates bulk ordering; ensure availability.  

- **Tarun Gloves (India) – *EPDM Isolator Gloves*** – EPDM heavyweight glove for gloveboxes. (Site only shows a general “EPDM Gloves” offering in “Isolator Gloves” category). Vendor claims EPDM material suitable for pharmaceutical environments ([www.tarungloves.com](https://www.tarungloves.com/isolator-gloves.html#:~:text=Color%20%20)). (Vendor: Tarun Gloves, India; URL: https://www.tarungloves.com/isolator-gloves.html)  
  *Confidence: Low* (Vague details; no length or thickness given). *Recommendation: 0.50* – Indian manufacturer with EPDM chemical gloves. *Reason:* Material matches query (EPDM), and local presence could offer competitive pricing. *Concerns:* Lacks product specification (length, thickness not listed). Quality and certifications (FDA, ISO) are uncertain. Likely need to verify actual glove parameters and minimum order quantities.
